column2: "Na aber a Seba ɔhembaa no tsee Solomon ne nka wɔ EWURADZE ne dzin ho no
column3: ɔbaa dɛ ɔdze nsɛmbisa dzendzen robɔsɔ no ahwɛ."

column2: "Na ɔnye akadofo kɛsenara baa Jerusalɛm
column3: efumpɔnkɔ a wɔsoso nduhuam
column5: na abo a ɔsom bo: na aber a ɔbaa Solomon nkyɛn no
column6: ɔnye no twetwee dza ɔwɔ n’akoma mu nyinara ho nkɔmbɔ."

column2: "Na Solomon kyerɛɛ no ne nsɛm nyinara ano: asɛm biara ennsuma ɔhen no a ɔannka annkyerɛ no."
"Na aber a Seba ɔhembaa no hun Solomon ne nyansaa nyinara
column3: na fie a oesi
column10: na n’afowee a ɔnam do fow kɔ EWURADZE fie no; noho boow no kɛse."

column2: "Na ɔsee ɔhen no dɛ
column3: Wo ndwuma na wo nyansaa ho asɛm a metsee no wɔ mankasa m’asaase do no yɛ nokwar."

column2: "Naaso manngye nsɛm no enndzi
column3: dze bodur dɛ mebae
column4: na medze m’enyiwa mebohu yi: na hwɛ
column5: wɔannka ne fa mpo annkyerɛ me: wo nyansaa na wo prɔmprɔmyɛ bor wo nka a metsee no do."

column2: "Ahomka aka wo nkorɔfo
column3: ahomka aka wo nkowaa yi a wogyinagyina w’enyim daa

column2: "Nhyira nka EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn a ɔpɛ w’asɛm ma ɔdze wo esi Israel ahengua do: osiandɛ EWURADZE dɔ Israel daa
column3: dɛm ntsi na ɔahyɛ wo ɔhen dɛ yɛ atsɛmbudze na pɛrpɛryɛ."

column2: "Na ɔmaa ɔhen no sika dwetsir kɛse ɔha eduonu
column3: na nduhuam burututuitu
column4: na abo a ɔsom bo: nduhuam a ɔdɔɔ so dɛm bi ammba bio a ɔtse dɛ mbrɛ Seba ɔhembaa no dze maa ɔhen Solomon no."

column2: "Na Hiram n’ahɛn no so a wɔdze sika fi Ofir bae no
column3: wɔdze  almug   ndua piigyan na abo a ɔsom bo fi Ofir bae."

column2: "Na ɔhen no dze  almug   ndua no yɛɛ EWURADZE fi no na ɔhen ne fi no ho edum
column3: nsankutsen so na bɛnta asanku maa adwontofo no: dɛm  almug   ndua yi bi ammba bio
column4: nkyii so woennhu bi araa dze bodu ndɛ da yi."

column2: "Na ɔhen Solomon maa Seba ɔhembaa no n’apɛdze nyinara
column3: biribiara a obisae no
column4: ɔsor dza ofi ɔhen Solomon nsamu a ɔdze maa no no. Nna odzii ndan
column5: na osii mu kɔr nankasa n’asaase do

column2: "Na afei sika a ɔbaa Solomon hɔ wɔ afe kor mu ne nkerii yɛ sika dwetsir kɛse ahaesia eduosia esia
column6: na dza ofi aforaforadɔm ahemfo nyinara hɔ
column7: na aman no mu ambradofo no hɔ."

column2: "Na ɔhen Solomon dze sika a wɔabor yɛɛ akyɛm akɛse ahaenu: sika dwetɛbona ahaesia na ɔdze duraa kyɛm kor ho."
"Na ɔdze sika a wɔabor yɛɛ akyɛm nkakraba ahaasa; sika pɔɔn ebiasa na ɔdze duraa kyɛm kor ho: na ɔhen no dze koguu Lebanon kwaa dan no mu."
"Nkyii so ɔhen no yɛɛ asombɛn ahengua kɛsenara na ɔdze sika mapa duraa ho."
"Ahengua no wɔ ntwerba esia
column3: na ahengua no n’etsifi yɛ korkorba wɔ ekyir: na nsa wowɔ afa na afa wɔ atsenaa no ho
column4: na ngyata ebien gyinagyina nsa no ho."

column2: "Na ngyata duebien gyinagyina ntwerba esia no do hɔ wɔ afa na afa ha: wɔnnyɛɛ dza ɔtse dɛm bi da wɔ ahenman biara mu."
"Na ɔhen Solomon no nkɔɔpow a ɔnom mu nyinara sika dze a
column3: na Lebanon kwaa dan mu nkɔɔpow nyinara sika mapa a: dwetɛ dze biara nnyi mu; wommbu no hwee wɔ Solomon n’aber do."

column2: "Nna ɔhen Solomon wɔ Tarsis ahɛn wɔ po do a ɔka Hiram n’ahɛn ho: mfensa biara mu Tarsis ahɛn no ba prɛko
column3: dze sika

column2: "Na ɔhen Solomon boor asaase do ahemfo nyinara do wɔ ahonya na nyansa mu."
"Na asaase nyinara hwehwɛɛ Solomon n’enyim ehu
column3: dɛ wobetsie ne nyansaa a Nyankopɔn dze ahyɛ n’akoma mu no."

column2: "Na hɔn mu nyimpa biara dze n’ayɛyɛdze bae
column3: dwetɛ ndzɛmba

column2: "Na Solomon boaboaa ntseaseanam na mpɔnkɔdofo ano: na onyaa ntseaseanam apem ahaanan
column3: na mpɔnkɔdofo mpemduebien a ɔdze hɔn siesiee ntseaseanam nkurow no mu
column4: na ɔhen no nkyɛn wɔ Jerusalɛm."

column2: "Na ɔhen no maa dwetɛ yɛɛ dɛ abo wɔ Jerusalɛm
column3: na ɔmaa nkyindur ndua yɛɛ dɛ ankye ndua a ɔwowɔ abɔnmu nkurow mu

column2: "Na mpɔnkɔ a Solomon nyae no wɔdze fi Egypt nye Kue bae: na ɔhen n’eguadzifo no kɛgyegyee hɔn ekuwekuw no
column3: kuw kor wɔ no bo do."

column2: "Na wɔdze tseaseanam fi Egypt bae bɛgyee dwetɛ dwetɛbona ahaesia
column3: na ɔpɔnkɔ so
column4: dwetɛbona ɔha eduonum: na dɛmara so na wokitsaa bi fiir edzi brɛɛ Hitifo ahemfo nyinara
